sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The big focus yesterday was on the future of war-torn Ukraine, with President Zelensky receiving a standing ovation for his words to the audience.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He also had face time with some CEOs from some of the most powerful and wealthiest banks from across the world and representatives from the tech world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In that meeting was also the president of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen, saying that she'd visited Kyiv a number of times and she welcomed the efforts to tackle transparency and fix corruption in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In an interview with Euronews yesterday, she also said that on the 1st of February, at a summit in Brussels, she hoped that the 50 billion euro package for Ukraine would be approved, and if not, that 26 EU countries without the Hungarian government would go ahead and approve that financial lifeline for Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
